parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The primary domain name whose statistics you want to query.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

The default value is the day when you query the data.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

You can query only records of the last 90 days.

parameters.name: SubDomain
parameters.description: The subdomain name whose statistics you want to query.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the request statistics that you want to query. Valid values:

*   DOMAIN: queries the request statistics by domain name.
*   SUB_DOMAIN: queries the request statistics by subdomain name.
